editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull is valued by the world's strongest athletes, busiest professionals, university students, and long-distance travelers

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Sugarfree is the same Red Bull, just without sugar

editions.name: The Winter Edition
editions.flavor_description: The taste of the new Red Bull Winter Edition juicy Fuji Apples with a gently warming Ginger spice

editions.name: The Yellow Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Yellow Edition. Let the exotic Tropical Fruits taste surprise you!

editions.name: The White Edition
editions.flavor_description: Prepare for an exceptional taste experience! This is the exotic Coconut and rich Blueberry taste of Red Bull White Edition

editions.name: The Red Edition
editions.flavor_description: Refreshing Watermelon taste Red Bull Red Edition. A rosy freshness and time-tested energy reminiscent of warm climes

editions.name: The Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Blue Edition. A classic with a pleasant Blueberry taste

editions.name: The Apricot Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Apricot Edition tempts with a perfect harmony of Apricot and Strawberry, given fullness by a Peach undertone

_translated_editions.name: Energy Drink
_translated_editions.description: "Red Bull" is valued by the world's strongest athletes, busiest professionals, university students, and long-distance travelers.

_translated_editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
_translated_editions.description: Wings without sugar: "Red Bull Sugarfree" is the same "Red Bull", just without sugar.

_translated_editions.name: The Yellow Edition
_translated_editions.description: Red Bull YELLOW EDITION. Let the exotic tropical fruits taste surprise you!

_translated_editions.name: The White Edition
_translated_editions.description: Prepare for an exceptional taste experience! This is the exotic coconut and rich blueberry taste of "Red Bull White Edition".

_translated_editions.name: The Red Edition
_translated_editions.description: Refreshing watermelon taste Red Bull RED EDITION. A rosy freshness and time-tested energy reminiscent of warm climes.

_translated_editions.name: The Blue Edition
_translated_editions.description: Red Bull BLUE EDITION. A classic with a pleasant blueberry taste.

_translated_editions.name: The Apricot Edition
_translated_editions.description: Red Bull APRICOT EDITION tempts with a perfect harmony of apricot and strawberry, given fullness by a peach undertone.

_translated_editions.name: The Winter Edition
_translated_editions.description: The taste of the new Red Bull WINTER EDITION - juicy FUJI apples with a gently warming ginger spice.
